Package com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedretrievalservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform alert feed retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve alert feeds and determine which ones they are subscribed to.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAlertFeedRetrievalService A method for retrieving the alert feeds that the user is permitted to see, and which of those the user is subscribed to.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.alertfeedretrievalservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform alert feed retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve alert feeds and determine which ones they are subscribed to.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

The alert feed retrieval service has a single method that searches for alert feeds.

Web methodDescription
SearchAlertFeeds Retrieves alert feeds from the Analysis Repository according to criteria including the descriptions of the feeds and whether the current user is subscribed to them.

The alert feed retrieval service is closely related to the alert retrieval service and the search service.

Since:
3.0
